traceability.evidence: 1. No config file support: neither bin/dry-aged-deps.js nor src/print-outdated.js reads `.dry-aged-deps.json` or a `minSeverity` property. 2. Severity threshold logic not implemented: in src/print-outdated.js the vulnerability filter always excludes any package with a non-zero vulnerability count, ignoring the `prodMinSeverity`/`devMinSeverity` options entirely. It never parses per-vulnerability severity from `npm audit` output. 3. Tests cover CLI flag parsing for `--severity` but there are no unit or integration tests verifying filtering behavior based on different severity thresholds.
